question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. train
B. person holding bags
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The person holding bags is in the foreground on the platform, while the train is further back, clearly establishing their relative 3D depth without ambiguity.
